New Records: Emilio Nsue scored the first Afcon treble since 2008
Key Match Events: Emilio Nsue scored a hat-trick for Equatorial Guinea
Josete Miranda scored a goal for Equatorial Guinea
Ze Turbo scored a consolation goal for Guinea-Bissau in stoppage time
Esteban Orozco scored an own goal for Guinea-Bissau
Post-Match Reflections: The result sends Equatorial Guinea top of Group A on four points before hosts Ivory Coast face Nigeria (17:00 GMT) and puts Juan Micha's side on the brink of a place in the last 16 following their 1:1 draw against Nigeria on Sunday
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was part of the 2024 Africa Cup of Nations
